# Mini-Arm Static Assets

This folder contains static assets for the documentation:

## Required Images

Please add the following images for full documentation support:

- `mini-arm-logo.png` - Logo for documentation header
- `mini-arm-banner.jpg` - Banner image for landing page
- `favicon.ico` - Browser favicon

### Assembly Images
Create an `assembly/` subfolder with:
- `step1_base.jpg`
- `step2_shoulder.jpg`
- `step3_upper_arm.jpg`
- `step4_forearm.jpg`
- `step5_wrist.jpg`
- `step6_electronics.jpg`

### ROS2 Images
Create a `ros2/` subfolder with:
- `rviz_interactive.png`
- `moveit_rviz.png`

## Image Guidelines

- Use high-resolution images (at least 800px wide)
- Optimize for web (compress PNG/JPG)
- Include alt text in RST files
